pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/query-string.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/query-string/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install query-string```#### Features+ Python 2/3 compatible#### Examples```python>>> import query_string>>> query_string.parse('https://site.org/index.php?k=v&k2=v2&k3=v3#anchor'){'k': 'v','k2': 'v2', 'k3': 'v3'}>>> query_string.parse('k=v&k2=v2&k3=v3'){'k': 'v','k2': 'v2', 'k3': 'v3'}```#### Links+ [Query string - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Query_string)

readme42.com
